bs-notifications-email-edit-subject: Yaɣili "$1" {{GENDER:$2|edited}} $4, ŋun daa niŋ maliniŋ ŋɔ nyɛ $3
bs-notifications-email-edit-body:
Yaɣili ŋɔ "$1" daa {{GENDER
:$2|edited}} $5 ŋun daa maliniŋ ŋɔ nyɛ $4.

Sabima:
$3
bs-notifications-email-create-subject: Yaɣili "$1" {{GENDER:$2|created}} $4 din daa yoo li nyɛ $3
bs-notifications-email-create-body:
Yaɣili ŋɔ "$1" daa {{GENDER:$2|yoomi}} $5 din daa yoo li nyɛ $3.
Yɛlima:
$4
A ni tooi kpɛ yaɣili ŋɔ a yi doli so shɛli din doli na ŋɔ
bs-notifications-email-delete-body:
Yaɣili ŋɔ "$1" daa {{GENDER:$2|deleted}} $5 ŋun daa yihili nyɛ $3.

Di daliri n-daa nyɛ:
$4
bs-notifications-email-move-body:
Yaɣili ŋɔ "$1" daa {{GENDER
:$2|moved}} kpɛ "$3" $6, din daa zaŋ li kpɛ nyɛ $4.
Daliri n-daa nyɛ:
$5
A ni tooi doli soli ŋɔ kpɛ yaɣili din doli na ŋɔ
bs-notifications-email-delete-subject: Yaɣili "$1  {{GENDER:$2|deleted}} $4 ŋun daa yihili maa nyɛ  $3
bs-notifications-echo-param-timestamp: Zuɣu {{#time: j F|@$1}} ni {{#time: h:i a|@$1}}
